description.english: Pull up your explorer socks and complete the tutorial.
description.arabic: ﻲﻤﻴﻠﻌﺘﻟا ضﺮﻌﻟا ﻞﻤﻛأو فﺎﺸﻜﺘﺳﻼﻟ ﺪﻌﺘﺳا
description.schinese: 穿上你的探索者袜子，完成教程
description.tchinese: 穿上你的探險家襪子並完成教學關卡
description.dutch: Trek je verkennerssokken aan en voltooi de tutorial
description.french: Retrousse tes manches d'explorateur en terminant le didacticiel
description.german: Schnüre deine Entdecker-Schuhe und beende das Tutorial.
description.italian: Rimbocca le maniche da esploratore e completa il tutorial
description.japanese: 気を引き締めてチュートリアルをクリアする
description.koreana: 탐험가의 정신을 살려 튜토리얼을 완료하세요
description.brazilian: Calce suas meias de explorador e conclua o tutorial
description.russian: Проникнись духом приключений и пройди обучение.
description.spanish: Ponte las botas de explorador y completa el tutorial
description.turkish: Kaşif çoraplarını giy ve eğitimi tamamla

displayName.japanese: バミューダから脱出しよう

description.english: Help Milton to escape the Bermuda.
description.arabic: ادﻮﻣﺮﺑ ﻦﻣ بوﺮﻬﻟا ﻲﻓ نﻮﺘﻠﻴﻣ ﺪﻋﺎﺳ
description.schinese: 帮助米尔顿逃离百慕大
description.tchinese: 協助米爾頓逃離百慕達
description.dutch: Help Milton te ontsnappen uit de Bermuda-driehoek
description.french: Milton veut fuir les Bermudes
description.german: Hilf Milton dabei, aus dem Bermuda-Dreieck zu flüchten
description.italian: Aiutate Milton a fuggire dalle Bermude
description.japanese: 遭難したミルトンを助けよう
description.koreana: 밀튼이 버뮤다를 탈출할 수 있도록 도와주세요
description.brazilian: Ajude Milton a sair das Bermudas
description.russian: Помоги Милтону выбраться с Бермуд
description.spanish: Ayuda a Milton a escapar de las Bermudas
description.turkish: Milton'ın Bermuda'dan kaçmasına yardım edin

description.english: Help Milton to escape the Bermuda without opening a single Star Map.
description.arabic: .ةﺪﺣاو مﻮﺠﻧ ﺔﻄﻳﺮﺧ ﺢﺘﻓ نود ﻦﻣ ادﻮﻣﺮﺑ ﻦﻣ بوﺮﻬﻟا ﻲﻓ نﻮﺘﻠﻴﻣ ﺪﻋﺎﺳ
description.schinese: 在未打开一张星图的情况下帮助米尔顿逃离百慕大。
description.tchinese: 在不開啟星星地圖的情況下協助米爾頓逃離百慕達。
description.dutch: Help Milton te ontsnappen uit de Bermuda-driehoek zonder een enkele sterrenkaart te openen.
description.french: Aide Milton à fuir les Bermudes sans ouvrir une seule carte des étoiles.
description.german: Hilf Milton dabei, aus dem Bermuda-Dreieck zu flüchten, ohne eine einzige Sternenkarte zu öffnen.
description.italian: Aiuta Milton a fuggire dalle Bermude senza aprire una sola mappa delle stelle.
description.japanese: スターマップを1枚も開かずにミルトンをバミューダから脱出させる。
description.koreana: 별 지도를 열지 않고 밀튼이 버뮤다를 탈출할 수 있도록 도와주세요.
description.brazilian: Ajude Milton a sair das Bermudas sem abrir um Mapa Estelar sequer.
description.russian: Помоги Милтону покинуть Бермуды, не открыв ни одной звездной карты.
description.spanish: Ayuda a Milton a escapar de las Bermudas sin abrir un solo mapa estelar.
description.turkish: Tek bir Yıldız Haritası açmadan Milton'ın Bermuda'dan kaçmasına yardım edin.

description.english: Collect all Relics and then pay a visit to the Relic Monument.
description.arabic: .يﺮﺛﻷا يرﺎﻛﺬﺘﻟا ﺐﺼﻨﻟا ةرﺎﻳﺰﺑ ﻢﻗ ﻢﺛ ﺔﻳﺮﺛﻷا ﻊﻄﻘﻟا ﻞﻛ ﻊﻤﺟا
description.schinese: 收集所有的文物，然后去一趟文物纪念馆。
description.tchinese: 收集所有文物並前往參觀文物紀念碑。
description.dutch: Verzamel alle relieken en ga dan naar het Reliek-monument.
description.french: Récupère toutes les reliques puis rends-toi devant le Monument aux reliques.
description.german: Sammle alle Relikte und besuche dann das Reliktmonument.
description.italian: Raccogli tutte le reliquie, poi visita il Monumento reliquia.
description.japanese: 遺物をすべて集めて遺物モニュメントを訪ねる。
description.koreana: 유물을 모두 모은 후에 유물 건조물을 방문하세요.
description.brazilian: Colete todas as Relíquias e, então, visite o Monumento de Relíquia.
description.russian: Собери все реликвии, а затем посети Памятник реликвий.
description.spanish: Consigue todas las reliquias y visita el Monumento Reliquia.
description.turkish: Tüm Yadigarları toplayın ve Relic Anıtı'nı ziyaret edin.

description.english: Sort the sheep into their correct pens within 200 seconds of the gate opening.
description.arabic: .ﺔﺑاﻮﺒﻟا ﺢﺘﻓ ﻦﻣ ﺔﻴﻧﺎﺛ ٢٠٠ لﻼﺧ ﺔﺤﻴﺤﺼﻟا ﺎﻬﻣﻼﻗﺄﺑ فاﺮﺨﻟا ﻒﻨﺻ
description.schinese: 在羊圈门开启的200秒内，把羊赶入对应的圈内。
description.tchinese: 在大門開啟的200秒內將羊群趕進正確的羊圈裡。
description.dutch: Zet de schapen binnen 200 seconden nadat de poort opengegaan is in het juiste verblijf.
description.french: Déplace les moutons dans les bons enclos moins de 200 secondes après l'ouverture du portail.
description.german: Ordne die Schafe innerhalb von 200 Sekunden nach der Öffnung des Tors in ihre korrekten Gehege ein.
description.italian: Sistema le pecore nei recinti giusti entro 200 secondi dall'apertura del cancello.
description.japanese: ゲートが開いている200秒の間に羊を正しい囲いの中に入れる。
description.koreana: 문이 열려 있는 200초 이내에 양을 올바른 우리에 넣어 분류하세요.
description.brazilian: Coloque as ovelhas nos currais certos em até 200 segundos após a abertura do portão.
description.russian: Распредели овец по правильным загонам в течение 200 секунд с момента открытия ворот.
description.spanish: Ordena las ovejas en sus corrales en menos de 200 segundos desde que se abra la puerta.
description.turkish: Kapı açıldıktan sonra 200 saniye içinde koyunları doğru ağıllara ayırın.

displayName.japanese: クラーケンチャレンジ

description.english: Vanquish the Kraken in 7 shots of the cannon.
description.arabic: .ﻊﻓﺪﻤﻟا ﻦﻣ تﺎﻘﻠﻃ ٧ـﺑ ﻦﻴﻛاﺮﻜﻟا مﺰﻫا
description.schinese: 使用7发大炮炮弹消灭北海巨妖。
description.tchinese: 在7發大砲以內消滅北海巨妖。
description.dutch: Versla de Kraken met 7 schoten met het kanon.
description.french: Viens à bout du Kraken en 7 coups de canon.
description.german: Besiege den Kraken mit 7 Kanonenschüssen.
description.italian: Sconfiggi il kraken con 7 colpi di cannone.
description.japanese: クラーケンを大砲7発以内で撃退する。
description.koreana: 7발의 대포로 크라켄을 처치하세요.
description.brazilian: Derrote o Kraken em 7 tiros do canhão.
description.russian: Уничтожь кракена за 7 выстрелов из пушки.
description.spanish: Elimina al kraken con 7 disparos del cañón.
description.turkish: 7 top atışıyla Kraken'i mağlup edin.

description.english: Solve the tricky orange liquid levers puzzle in Secret Base Island.
description.arabic: .ﺔﻳﺮﺴﻟا ةﺪﻋﺎﻘﻟا ةﺮﻳﺰﺟ ﻲﻓ ﺮﻴﺤﻤﻟا ﺔﻴﻟﺎﻘﺗﺮﺒﻟا ﻞﺋاﻮﺴﻟا تﺎﻌﻓار ﺰﻐﻟ ﻞﺤﺑ ﻢﻗ
description.schinese: 解开秘密基地岛上烧脑的橙色液体杠杆谜题。
description.tchinese: 破解秘密基地島複雜的橘色液體控制桿謎題。
description.dutch: Los de lastige puzzel met vloeibare schakelaars op het Geheimebasis-eiland op.
description.french: Résous l'énigme épineuse des leviers liquides orange sur l'Île de la base secrète.
description.german: Löse das knifflige Hebel-Rätsel auf der Geheimbasis-Insel.
description.italian: Risolvi il difficile rompicapo delle leve liquide arancioni nell'Isola base segreta.
description.japanese: 秘密基地島でトリッキーなオレンジ色の液体レバーのパズルを解く。
description.koreana: 비밀 기지 섬의 오렌지 액체 레버 퍼즐을 푸세요.
description.brazilian: Resolva o quebra-cabeças das alavancas de líquido laranja na Ilha da Base Secreta.
description.russian: Реши хитрую головоломку с оранжевой жидкостью на Конспиративном острове.
description.spanish: Soluciona el complicado rompecabezas de las palancas del líquido naranja en la Isla Base Secreta.
description.turkish: Secret Base Adası'ndaki karmaşık turuncu sıvı kolları bulmacasını çözün.

description.english: Unlock the mine cart in Shipwreck Island.
description.arabic: .ﺔﻨﻴﻔﺴﻟا مﺎﻄﺣ ةﺮﻳﺰﺟ ﻲﻓ مﺎﻐﻟﻷا ﺔﻠﺳ ﺢﺘﻓا
description.schinese: 解锁沉船岛上的矿车。
description.tchinese: 解鎖沉船島的礦車。
description.french: Débloque le chariot de la mine dans l'Île du naufrage.
description.german: Schalte den Minenwagen auf der Schiffbruch-Insel frei.
description.italian: Sblocca il carrello minerario nell'Isola del relitto.
description.japanese: 難破船島でトロッコをアンロックする。
description.koreana: 난파 섬의 광산 카트를 잠금 해제하세요.
description.brazilian: Desbloqueie o carrinho de mineração da Ilha do Naufrágio.
description.russian: Разблокируй вагонетку на Острове кораблекрушения.
description.spanish: Desbloquea el vagón minero en Isla Naufragio.
description.turkish: Shipwreck Adası'nda maden arabasının kilidini açın.

description.english: Defeat the almighty Fire God and gain some new worshippers, Oonga Oonga!
description.arabic: !ﺎﻐﻧوأ ﺎﻐﻧوأ ﺎﻳ دﺪﺠﻟا دﺎﻴﺳﻷا عﺎﺒﺗأ ﺾﻌﺑ ﺐﺴﻛاو يﻮﻘﻟا رﺎﻨﻟا ﺪﻴﺳ مﺰﻫا
description.schinese: 击败全能的火神，收获一些新的膜拜信徒，嗡嘎嗡嘎！
description.tchinese: 打敗偉大的火神並贏得新的敬拜者轟嘎轟嘎！
description.dutch: Versla de almachtige Vuurgod en krijg een stel nieuwe aanbidders, Oonga Oonga!
description.french: Viens à bout du tout-puissant dieu du feu et gagne de nouveaux fidèles, Oonga Oonga !
description.german: Besiege den mächtigen Feuergott und gewinne neue Anhänger, Unga unga!
description.italian: Sconfiggi l'onnipotente dio del fuoco e ottieni nuovi seguaci, Oonga oonga!
description.japanese: 偉大な火の神を倒して新たな崇拝者を獲得しよう。オーンガ、オーンガ！
description.koreana: 강력한 불의 신을 물리치고 새로운 숭배자 웅가 웅가를 얻으세요!
description.brazilian: Derrote o poderoso Deus do Fogo e ganhe novos adoradores, uga uga!
description.russian: Одолей всемогущего бога огня и получи новых почитателей, унга-унга!
description.spanish: Derrota al todopoderoso dios del fuego y gana algunos fieles. ¡Unga, unga!
description.turkish: Yüce Ateş Tanrısı'nı yenin ve yeni takipçiler kazanın, Oonga Oonga!

description.english: Complete the tile sliding puzzle in Labyrinth Island within 14 moves.
description.arabic: .ﺔﻛﺮﺣ ١٤ـﺑ ﺔﻫﺎﺘﻤﻟا ةﺮﻳﺰﺟ ﻲﻓ تﺎﻃﻼﺒﻟا ﺮﻳﺮﻤﺗ ﺰﻐﻟ ﻞﻤﻛأ
description.schinese: 在14步内完成迷宫岛上的滑块谜题。
description.tchinese: 在14步之內完成迷宮島的方塊移動謎題。
description.dutch: Los de tegelschuifpuzzel op Labyrint-eiland in 14 zetten op.
description.french: Résous l'énigme des tuiles à faire glisser en 14 coups ou moins sur l'Île labyrinthique.
description.german: Löse das Kachel-Rätsel auf der Labyrinthinsel in nur 14 Zügen.
description.italian: Completa il rompicapo delle piastrelle scorrevoli nell'Isola del labirinto, in 14 mosse.
description.japanese: 迷宮島のスライドパズルを14手以内に完成させる。
description.koreana: 14번의 이동 이내에 미로의 섬의 타일 슬라이딩 퍼즐을 완료하세요.
description.brazilian: Resolva o quebra-cabeças de blocos deslizantes na Ilha do Labirinto com no máximo 14 movimentos.
description.russian: Реши головоломку со скользящими плитками на Острове-лабиринте за 14 или меньше ходов.
description.spanish: Completa el rompecabezas de las losetas deslizantes en Isla Laberinto con 14 movimientos.
description.turkish: Labyrinth Adası'ndaki karo kaydırma bulmacasını 14 harekette çözün.

description.english: Inflate any puffer fish 10 times.
description.arabic: .تاﺮﻣ ١٠ خﻮﻔﻨﻳ ﺔﻜﻤﺳ خﺎﻔﺘﻧا ﻲﻓ ﺐﺒﺴﺗ
description.schinese: 让任意一只河豚膨胀10次。
description.tchinese: 讓任何一條河豚膨脹10次。
description.french: Gonfle n'importe quel poisson-globe à 10 reprises.
description.german: Blase einen Kugelfisch 10-mal auf.
description.italian: Gonfia 10 volte un pesce palla
description.japanese: フグを10回ふくらませる。
description.koreana: 복어를 10번 부풀리세요.
description.brazilian: Infle qualquer baiacu 10 vezes.
description.russian: Надуй иглобрюхов 10 раз.
description.spanish: Infla un pez globo 10 veces.
description.turkish: Herhangi bir balon balığını 10 kere şişirin.

description.english: Shoot 12 barrels in Secret Base Island.
description.arabic: .ﺔﻳﺮﺴﻟا ةﺪﻋﺎﻘﻟا ةﺮﻳﺰﺟ ﻲﻓ ﻼﻴﻣﺮﺑ ١٢ ﯽﻠﻋ رﺎﻨﻟا ﻖﻠﻃأ
description.schinese: 在秘密基地岛射破12个桶。
description.tchinese: 在秘密基地島射擊12個桶子。
description.french: Tire sur 12 tonneaux sur l'Île de la base secrète.
description.german: Schieße 12 Fässer auf der Geheimbasis-Insel ab.
description.italian: Spara a 12 barili nell'Isola base segreta
description.japanese: 秘密基地島のタルを12個撃つ。
description.koreana: 비밀 기지 섬에서 원통 12개를 쏘세요.
description.brazilian: Atire em 12 barris na Ilha da Base Secreta.
description.russian: Взорви 12 бочек на Конспиративном острове.
description.spanish: Dispara a 12 barriles en la Isla Base Secreta.
description.turkish: Secret Base Adası'nda 12 fıçı vurun.

description.english: Open the door to Quack's hut three times.
description.arabic: تاﺮﻣ ثﻼﺛ لﺎﺟﺪﻟا خﻮﻛ بﺎﺑ ﺢﺘﻓا
description.schinese: 三次打开通往嘎嘎小屋的门。
description.tchinese: 打開呱的草屋房門三次。
description.dutch: Open de deur van Quacks hut drie keer.
description.french: Ouvre la porte de la hutte de Coin à trois reprises.
description.german: Öffne die Tür zu Quacks Hütte 3-mal.
description.italian: Apri 3 volte la porta del capanno di Quack.
description.japanese: クアックの小屋のドアを3回開ける。
description.koreana: 꽥꽥의 오두막 문을 3번 여세요.
description.brazilian: Abra a porta da cabana do Quac três vezes.
description.russian: Открой дверь в хижину Кря 3 раза.
description.spanish: Abre la puerta al refugio de Cuac tres veces.
description.turkish: Vak Vak'ın kulübesinin kapısını üç kere açın.

description.english: Shoot 50 cannon balls in Shipwreck Island.
description.arabic: .ﺔﻨﻴﻔﺴﻟا مﺎﻄﺣ ةﺮﻳﺰﺟ ﻲﻓ ﻊﻓﺪﻣ ﺔﻔﻳﺬﻗ ٥٠ ﻖﻠﻃأ
description.schinese: 在沉船岛上发射50枚加农炮弹。
description.tchinese: 在沉船島發射50枚大砲砲彈。
description.french: Tire 50 boulets de canon sur l'Île du naufrage.
description.german: Schieße 50 Kanonenkugeln auf der Schiffbruch-Insel ab.
description.italian: Spara 50 palle di cannone nell'Isola del relitto
description.japanese: 難破船島で大砲を50発撃つ。
description.koreana: 난파 섬에서 대포를 50번 쏘세요.
description.brazilian: Atire 50 balas de canhão na Ilha do Naufrágio.
description.russian: Выстрели 50 ядрами на Острове кораблекрушения.
description.spanish: Dispara 50 veces el cañón en Isla Naufragio.
description.turkish: Shipwreck Adası'nda 50 top mermisi atın.
